cvList.title: Fullstack mobile app developer
desc: A mobile game build with Flutter / Dart. Backend using AWS Lambda / DynamoDB / Typescript / Node.js
see https://gitee.com/NEWBRAN/create-tsdev  https://gitee.com/NEWBRAN/aws-v-cli these are tool set I developed for this project, and open source recently
Using Websocket / MQTT engine for live competition session.
An online shopping cart (for paying subscriptions) built with Vue 3 using Vite / paypal as payment solution. And the ad website also using the same tech stack (demo available upon request)

cvList.title: Fullstack developer
desc: Building a MVP, and turn into their own internal trading desk for their global clients.
UI - React (using PreactX engine instead of the FB react) Antd (Ant Design by Alibaba) plus jsonql API library using its own built-in JWT validation system
Backend - Node.js Koa with Jsonql. Database using PostgreSQL access via TypeORM (Model layer written in Typescript).
Create an experimental Blockchain database/engine using BlockBook (V.1) for using their smart contract feature (using PoS)
Mobile - a prototype mobile app for customers to use as a 2FA, using Flutter / Dart / Kotlin.
Desktop - a prototype app build with Electron for multiple platforms to view real-time data, also a built-in chat client using the Jsonql WebSocket extension.

cvList.title: Lead Fullstack Developer
desc: Lead a team of developers to create an internal Phonegap / Vue.js mobile app for 7000+ Govia staff, to provide real time train schedule data, station event status and nearby alternative station for transit using Google Map with additional programming layer.

Architect, implement and delivery a real time data stream platform to support the mobile application that delivery real time data, using a framework I created during the development - JSONQL (and I have been continue to developing it ever since) It’s a node.js framework that combine Ajax and Websocket, with built in user management with JWT.
Also setting up all the cloud platform on Azure, and manage application release with Govia in house IT team.
This application was featured in London Evening Standard.

cvList.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
desc: Create a web platform for their user / admin to manage their game shooting submission, users management responsive reactive web app using React.js / Preact.js, Bulma, Feather.js
Backend hook up to an IBM Cloudant + REST API.
The UI using AMP to optimized for SEO.

cvList.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
desc: This is an online platform for all the Jaguar dealership (and all their associated brands) to manage car test schedule.
Upgrade their 12 years old PHP inventory system to Node.js / Restify / IBM Cloudant / Mongodo and React.js. UI Using React / Redux / Bulma

cvList.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
desc: An online currency trading platform that allow customer to purchase / schedule payment multiple currency. The backend using .Net to hook up with various payment gateway, and the live currency trading data stream from Barclay.
UI Development with Angularjs. Phrase 1.5 upgrade registration part to Angular 4.
Kiosk live currency quoting system development with Riot and Node.js (Koa based)
Microsoft CRM dynamic plugins development with Preact.js / React.js modules.

Node.js / Riot.js based in house CRM system for staff to manage the online article content, it’s also a mini-CII system the staff can just submit a word document, and the CI system will generate HTML files, and publish it online based on the user input schedule.
